description.narrative: Operations support to Nutrition programme delivery, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children, adolescents and women, especially the most vulnerable and those affected by shocks, have increased access to and the utilization of promotional, preventive and curative nutrition services.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Operations support to Nutrition programme delivery

description.narrative: Operations support enabled the Nutrition program to deliver quality services from central to decentralized levels. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:10/02/2020
